tdmtpy.image.adjust_spines¶

adjust_spines(ax, spines)[source]¶

Adjust axis spine

Function to customize figure axes.

Parameters

  • ax (Axes) – the Axes instance containing the spine.

  • spines (list(str)) – spine type.
